segments.text: Mom , you know that Andrea and I sometimes worry about you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? Why would you worry about me ? I ’ m just fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re almost 70 years old , Mom ! Don ’ t you think it would be better for you if you moved in with us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No way ! I like my apartment , and I like to be independent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you ever get lonely living alone ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not at all . I see you and your family twice a week , and I enjoy seeing my own friends . I ’ m too busy to feel lonely !
segments.speaker: S2
